snippet.title: 51 BAFFES - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
51 Battle Arena inFamous Fighters Edition : Supremacy.
Available on 12/12/2020.
ENJMIN School project.
_____________________________________________

Itch : https://wanna-smile.itch.io/51-baffes
_____________________________________________

At the crossroads of a fighting game and a shooting game, 51 BAFFES takes you to the heart of the mysterious Area 51. An alien and a janitor confront each other via telekinetic powers. The first one wants to escape, the second one is just doing his job.

_____________________________________________


Genre : Fighting game.
Number of players : 2, Local.
Development time : 1 month.
Platform : Windows & Mac.

_____________________________________________

Credits : 

Minna CLAIR
     UX & UI
Pierre ESPAIGNET
     3D Art & Animation & UI 
Dorian FILLATRE
     3D Art & UI & Level Design
Enzo GIGLIO
     Music & Sound Design
Elisa LOWY
     Project Management
Léa ROPION
     Game & Level Design & UI
Pamphile SALTEL
     Programming
Benoit TOTH
     Programming
